function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential disruptions in lead times and prices for infrastructure and equipment due to the pandemic and closed international exchange markets.","Impact":"Delays in project timelines, increased costs, and potential supply shortages leading to project setbacks.","Mitigation":"Aggressively seeking alternative sources of goods and materials, submitting design alternates early, and diversifying supply chains.","Technologies":"Supply chain monitoring and management systems, supplier relationship management tools, and alternative sourcing platforms.","People":"Project participants responsible for procurement, vendors, and suppliers.","Owner":"Project participants responsible for procurement, vendors, and suppliers."},{"Description":"Vulnerability of globally integrated supply chains due to reliance on single suppliers or vendors concentrated in one country or region.","Impact":"Increased risk of supply chain disruptions, product shortages, and delays in delivery.","Mitigation":"Diversifying supplier base, evaluating supply chain resilience, and developing contingency plans.","Technologies":"Supply chain mapping and analysis tools, risk assessment software, and supply chain collaboration platforms.","People":"Businesses relying on single suppliers or vendors, supply chain managers, and procurement professionals.","Owner":"Business owners, supply chain managers, and procurement professionals."},{"Description":"Potential labor shortages in coastal US regions with shipping ports due to worker concerns about health and quarantine measures for incoming products.","Impact":"Delays in product delivery, increased transportation costs, and labor inefficiencies.","Mitigation":"Implementing safety measures for workers, optimizing logistics and transportation, and sourcing labor from alternative locations.","Technologies":"Workforce management systems, logistics optimization software, and remote monitoring technologies.","People":"Workers in coastal regions, logistics and transportation managers.","Owner":"Business owners, logistics and transportation managers."}]}
